Trade/Device Name(s): CONFIRM anti-Estrogen Receptor (SP1) Rabbit Monoclonal Primary Antibody
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for CONFIRM anti-Estrogen Receptor (SP1) Rabbit Monoclonal Primary Antibody for qualitative IHC detection of ER alpha in breast tissue
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro diagnostic use in the qualitative detection of estrogen receptor antigen in formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded breast tissue on Ventana automated slide stainers to aid management, prognosis, and prediction of hormone therapy for breast carcinoma
